Text: New pogocom Games PasswordDear Excite Classic Games player As of Friday December Excite will no longer be offering pogocom games to their members Dont worry you wont lose your existing ratings or tokens Your account and the pogocom games are still available Your account information is Account name Dominator Password pogo All you need to do is visit our homepage at and sign in with the name and password listed above If you have any questions about your pogocom games account please visit See you online The pogocom games team
